Wisdom and Patience Needed 

     If teachers see that it is impossible to bring a student under the discipline of the class, let him be removed to another class, for it may be that another teacher may be able to supply the deficiency. What one teacher lacks, another may possess; but if you can obtain the confidence of the youth, and bind him to your heart through cords of sympathy and love 
                                                                           173
you may win a soul to Christ. The wayward, self-willed, independent boy may become transformed in character.
